Tara Sutaria Height | Weight | Age | Boyfriend | Family | Biography | Wiki

Bolly Reporter
5 months ago

Tara Sutaria is an is Indian model, actress, singer, and dancer. She started her television career as a child artist in 2010. Tara works in many Hindi Television Serials. She served as the ambassador of Walt Disney India. Furthermore, she trained in classical ballet, modern dance and Latin American dances at the School of Classical Ballet and Western Dance, Royal Academy of Dance, United Kingdom. Also, she completed her training from the Imperial Society for Teachers of Dancing, United Kingdom.

Biography & Wiki

Tara Sutaria’s nickname is Tara. She was born on 19 November 1995 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Therefore, her current age is 24 years. Tara’s Zodiac is Scorpio. Her hometown is Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. She is from the Zoroastrian Parsi family.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Her father’s name is Himanshu Sutaria and her mother’s name is Tina Sutaria. She has a twin sister named Pia Sutaria.

Education and School, College

Tara completed her schooling from Bai Avabai Framji Petit Girls’ High School, Mumbai. After that, She joined St. Andrew’s College of Arts, Science and Commerce, Mumbai and completed a Bachelor’s degree in Mass Media.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

As per media, Tara Sutaria had a relationship with Vinod Mehra’s son Rohan Mehra, who made his Bollywood debut with the movie “Bazaar”. However, It was rumored that Tara dated with actor Sidharth Malhotra. In some recent interviews, she also admitted that Sidharth is ‘cute’ and a ‘great boyfriend’.

Favorite Things

Tara Sutaria filmography

Tara has been a professional singer since she was 7 years old, having sung in operas and competitions since then. She was associated with Disney Channel India as a video jockey. Tara Sutaria started her television career with Disney India’s Big Bada Boom and went on to star in the channel’s sitcoms The Suite Life of Karan & Kabir is 2012 and Oye Jassie in 2013.

She made Bollywood debut with Punit Malhotra‘s film Student of the Year 2 (SOTY 2) in 2019 along with Tiger Shroff and Ananya Pandey. This movie had collected ₹74.8 million on its opening day. Also, Her upcoming movies are “Marjaavaan” with Sidharth Malhotra, Riteish Deshmukh and “Tadap” with Ahan Shetty son of actor Suniel Shetty

Salary and Net Worth

The net worth of Tara Sutaria is approximately Rs. 29 crores Indian Rupees as of 2019. She took ₹2 Crore for her role in SOTY 2 as a salary.

Contact Address

Facts about Tara Sutaria

  • She is the childhood friend of the singer Armaan Malik.
  • She won INR 10,000 on the show “Entertainment Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega” in 2011.
  • Appeared in every sitcom by Disney Channel India between 2011-14.
  • Tara was considered for the role of Jasmine in Disney’s 2019 Aladdin (2019) remake but lost the part to Naomi Scott.
  • She has been endorsing various brands like Jet Gems, Swarovski, etc.
  • In 2015, she was invited to TEDx in Mumbai where she performed The Phantom of the Opera’s ‘Think of Me’ and American singer Whitney Houston’s ‘I Will Always Love You.’
  • Furthermore, In 2008, she was one of the top seven nominations “Pogo Amazing Kids Awards” in the singer’s category.
  • She has performed a lead role of Sandy in Raell Padamsee’s production of the musical Grease also she has recorded and performed solo concerts in London, Tokyo, Lavasa, and Mumbai.
